description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a MongoDB URL from https://cloud.mongodb.com. If you don't have one, use the already filled Mongo.

OWNER_ID.description: Enter the Owner ID here. You can use multiple IDs separated by a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: Enter a Pyrogram V2 String Session here. If there's an error, send the error screenshot to the repo owner (Get it from t.me/KK_StringGeneratorBot).

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Enter your Heroku account API key. If unknown, leave this blank.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter your app name which was filled in the first line (app name).

AUTO_GCAST.description: Enter [True] to enable auto Gcast/broadcast message, leave blank to disable.

AUTO_GCAST_MSG.description: Enter the auto broadcast message which will be broadcasted twice a day. Any type of message can be copied and pasted here.

START_IMG_URL.description: Enter your start bot image URL. Get it from t.me/vTelegraphBot

LOGGER_ID.description: Enter the log group ID where your bot is always an admin (ID must start with -100).
